data.name: RPG Sounds - Wizards Tower - Sound Pack
data.detailed_description:
Wizard's Tower is an RPG Sounds pack of looping music, ambient sounds, and SFX. It includes:

Music
  • Wizard Crystal
  • Spellcaster
  • Up The Ladder

SFX
  • Chest Open (6)
  • Magic Complex Riddle Mechanism (3)
  • Magic Net Catch (6)
  • Magic Net Fail (6)
  • Simple Riddle Mechanism (4)
  • Magic Trapdoor (4)
  • Mimic Chest Bite (4)
  • Mimic Chest Open (4)

data.short_description: Wizard's Tower is an RPG Sounds pack of looping music, ambient sounds, and SFX.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 capabilities

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.12
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 capabilities
